pages.text: $(a)$(l)Vivifica Elixir$() is the byproduct of $(l:relic_category/magic_condenser)condensing$() $(a)$(l)Vivifica Essence$() into a $(l)Glass Bottle$(). Whenever you drink this elixir, you'll add $(a)charge$() to it.$(br)When fully charged, $(a)$(l)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use)$() to heal nearby humans and pets.
